TERM: Encryption Completion

DEFINITION:
Encryption Completion: complete, the contents of the Secure Container will be encrypted using the RSA-4096 encryption algorithm with a password-based key

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
sword, and I will proceed with the encryption process.)

Encryption Process:

The encryption process will begin once you have entered and confirmed the password. The process may take some time, depending on the size of the contents of the Secure Container and the computational resources available.

Encryption Completion:

Once the encryption process is complete, the contents of the Secure Container will be encrypted using the RSA-4096 encryption algorithm with a password-based key. You will be n
